meanings.definition: To write together with someone else.
meanings.sent1: We enjoy cowriting stories during our creative writing class.
meanings.sent2: They are cowriting a script for a school play.
meanings.sent3: Cowriting with my friend always leads to interesting plot twists.
meanings.sent4: Cowriting is like a dance, each partner taking turns leading.
meanings.sent5: The art of cowriting requires good communication and compromise.

meanings.definition: The act of writing collaboratively with another person.
meanings.sent1: Cowriting can be a fun way to brainstorm ideas with a friend.
meanings.sent2: The success of their project was due to their effective cowriting.
meanings.sent3: I never knew cowriting could be so entertaining until I tried it.
meanings.sent4: In the world of cowriting, two minds are better than one.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of cowriting is the shared creativity and teamwork involved.
